subject:
[cc-devel] [ cctools-Feature Requests-1702541 ] Generic "Share
	This" plugin
body:
Feature Requests item #1702541, was opened at 2007-04-17 16:09
Message generated for change (Comment added) made by kidproto
You can respond by visiting: 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&atid=559969&aid=1702541&group_id=80503

Please note that this message will contain a full copy of the comment thread,
including the initial issue submission, for this request,
not just the latest update.
Category: ccHost
Group: None
Status: Open
Priority: 4
Private: No
Submitted By: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
Assigned to: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
Summary: Generic "Share This" plugin

Initial Comment:
Many CC-related folks are asking for a share this plugin where we can add digg, delicious, facebook share and others to ccHost in a quick way. See http://rejon.org/ on each blog post to see the way there is a wordpress pluging that allows for many of these sites social bookmarks to be shared.

Yes, this is a simple code hack, but one that will allow ccHost content to be dugg easily by members.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

>Comment By: Jon Phillips (kidproto)
Date: 2007-05-16 11:29

Message:
Logged In: YES 
user_id=914868
Originator: YES

add bloglines support and other generic "blog this" services
